byline.original: By C.L. SULZBERGER By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: H Hoover on role in war; text
snippet: BELGRADE, Yugoslavia, Feb. 2--The Balkan Entente conference opened today with a three-and-one-half-hour discussion among the Foreign Ministers of Yugoslavia, Greece, Turkey and Rumania....

headline.main: Balkans Seek to Avoid War Role As Conference Opens in Belgrade; Emphasis Laid on Eliminating Provocation --Economic Cooperation Is Stressed --Bulgarian Friendship Sought

lead_paragraph: BELGRADE, Yugoslavia, Feb. 2--The Balkan Entente conference opened today with a three-and-one-half-hour discussion among the Foreign Ministers of Yugoslavia, Greece, Turkey and Rumania.
